oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Prozessqualität im Wandel: Beobachtungen am Beispiel der Bio-Wertschöpfungskette in Österreich
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kratochvil, R.
Lindenthal, T.
Vogl, C.R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
"Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Initially, organic farming claims to take care of ecological, economic, social, political as well as ethical aspects alongside the supply chain. Current dynamics in the Austrian organic farming sector endanger the achievement of these process quality aims. A number of measures have to be taken to keep these aims as they seem to be essential for the prosperity and viability of the organic farming sector in the long run.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kratochvil, R.; Lindenthal, T. and Vogl, C.R. (2005) Prozessqualität im Wandel: Beobachtungen am Beispiel der Bio-Wertschöpfungskette in Österreich. [Process quality in flux: Inquiry alongside the organic supply chain in Austria.] In: Heß, J and Rahmann, G (Eds.) Ende der Nische, Beiträge zur 8. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, kassel university press GmbH, Kassel.
